ygData.subject: Enter Trinity

Subject: Enter Trinity

The huge star ship went plummeting through the atmosphere of the 
earth.  The ship, heavily damaged from metor collisions and interior 
explosions, lit up the sky as it burned, leaving a huge smoke trail 
as it fell.  The metal on the hull started to melt from the heat of 
the atmospheric friction as it fell. The ship was headed for a hill  
two miles from the maximal ship, Cybertron Fire.   Just before 
impact, a small pod was ejected out of the ship. The huge ship hit 
the ground and exploded on inpact.  A bright flash of light could be 
seen from miles around from the explosion.  The ground shook and a 
huge crater was left from the inpact and explosion.  Debrie and 
rubble was all that was left of the once huge craft. Bits of bots and 
parts were strung out around through the refuse of what used to be 
the ship.  

The pod had landed and finally came to rest along the bottom of a dry 
creek bed. About a mile from the maximal base.  The bot inside was a 
juevenal.  It had a form, that of a small saber tooth tiger kitten.  
She lay on her side inside the pod, in stasis lock. Shortly after 
landing, the pod started to emitt a small homing beacan signal.
